content.text:
# Athletics at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games â€“ Men's 1 mile

The '''men's 1 mile event at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games was held on 11 and 13 August at the Independence Park in Kingston, Jamaica. It was the last time that the imperial distance was contested at the Games, being replaced subsequently by the 1500 metres.
